summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for disposition of certain monies seized and forfeited and proceeds of the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited pursuant to the Uniform Controlled Substances Act; accepting such forfeitures; appropriating such monies to pay the State of Washington; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1995 Budget of the Police Department by reimbursable appropriation from the General Fund by three-forths vote.
